questions.question_text: No clear actions were detected in your input. Could you clarify what specific tasks or changes should be performed?
questions.context:
The input text '请为 IntentBuilder 类添加完整的文档注释，包括：
- 类级别的 docstring 说明其用途和 RED LINES
- 每个公共方法的参数说明和返回值
- 使用示例
目标文件：agen...' does not contain clear action verbs or task descriptions.
questions.default_strategy: Generate a minimal documentation-only intent as fallback
